data.actual_result: A million dialogue boxes that take a while to click through
data.expected_result: One "chill zone" dialogue or some sort of time-out system
data.short_description: Spamming messages at a ludricous rate causes more than one "chill zone" dialog to appear; clickling through all of them can take a while
data.steps_to_repro: - Use an autohotkey script or mouse bind or something to spam a message + enter over 10 times a second - Use it, flood messages into a channel
